flow-definition.description: Pipe : Setup Install Scripts => Uninstall Clusters => Install Clusters => Setup Cross Cluster Tickets => Password-less Ssh https://dzone.com/refcardz/continuous-delivery-with-jenkins-workflow ----------------- Create a cluster install jenkins job if not already present Edit Roles file for install - so install scripts roles file can be confgured via Jenkins. Start install for both clusters. Set up crosscluster replication. Set up passwordless ssh between stress driver nodes and all the other cluster nodes, due to mapr cluster check.
